titles.title: Rural DOCS Act
A bill to amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to provide for a demonstration project to increase substance use provider capacity under the Medicaid program.
Rural Development of Opioid Capacity Services Act
Rural DOCS Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Rural Development of Opioid Capacity Services Act or the Rural DOCS Act
This bill requires the Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services to establish a Medicaid demonstration project to increase provider treatment capacity for substance-use disorders.
